title: Submarine control
creator_credit: Bob Privett, Allan Crick and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: An explanation of the basic principles of hydrostatics which govern the movements of submarines. The film includes simple demonstrations of neutral, positive and negative buoyancies and methods used to keep a submarine in trim.
creator_credit_for_label: Bob Privett, Allan Crick and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
